code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white m aged 53 Ys presents with mild chest pain and palpitations. pt also reports moderate shortness of breath occurring with exertion, mild difficulty breathing when laying down. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 65 in, Weight 154 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Chest = bibasilar crackles B/L, Heart = normal S1, S2, laterally displaced apical impulse, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant heart sounds and no murmur, Abdomen = tender, mild hepatomegaly a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed enalapril - 2.5 mg 2 x day, and ordered BNP.

s:a male steel worker aged 53 yrs describes mild pallor, mild fatigue and mild easy fatigability. o:Height 65 in, Weight 153 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC, Direct Antiglobulin (Coombs) test.

s:patient says he is having symptoms of mild pallor 10-11 times a week, mostly during the day. pt is a 54 YO male steel worker. he does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 66 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 67, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

content2.Unmatched: patient says he is having symptoms
he does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol

td.content: s:a m steel worker aged 54 years complains of recurrent mild chest pain and palpitations over the past month. The pt reports mild difficulty breathing when laying down, moderate shortness of breath occurring with exertion. o:Height 66 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Chest = bibasilar crackles B/L, Heart = normal S1, S2, laterally displaced apical impulse, Extremities = no cyanosis, no edema or clubbing, Heart = distant heart sounds and no murmur, Abdomen = tender, mild hepatomegaly a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed enalapril - 2.5 mg 2 x day, and ordered BNP.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
